form.label: Acquisition
form.description: Click the graphs or tables to drilldown

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t first(Web.http_session_channel) AS http_session_channel FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session
|inputlookup WA_settings | fields value source | dedup value

| tstats summariesonly=t prestats=t dc(Web.http_session) AS Sessions FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY _time,Web.http_session_channel $span$ | timechart usenull=f $span$ dc(Web.http_session) AS Sessions by Web.http_session_channel

| top http_session_channel countfield=Sessions percentfield="% Sessions" | eval "% Sessions"=round('% Sessions',2) | eval "% Sessions"='% Sessions'."%" | rename http_session_channel as Channel | addcoltotals labelfield=Channel

| tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) AS http_session_pageviews,max(Web.http_session_duration) AS http_session_duration,first(Web.http_session_channel) AS http_session_channel FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats count(eval(http_session_pageviews=1)) AS Bounces, count(eval(http_session_pageviews>1)) AS NonBounces,avg(http_session_pageviews) AS "Pages/Session", avg(http_session_duration) AS "Avg. Session Duration", count AS Sessions, sum(http_session_pageviews) AS Pageviews, sum(Duration) AS Duration by http_session_channel | eval Bouncerate=round(100*(Bounces/(Bounces+NonBounces)),2) | fields http_session_channel Bouncerate "Pages/Session" "Avg. Session Duration" Sessions Pageviews Duration Bounces NonBounces | eval Bouncerate=Bouncerate."%" | rename http_session_channel as "Channel" | eval "Pages/Session"=round('Pages/Session',2) | eval "Avg. Session Duration"=round('Avg. Session Duration',2) | appendpipe [ stats sum(Sessions) AS Sessions, sum(Pageviews) as Pageviews, sum(Duration) as Duration, sum(Bounces) as Bounces, sum(NonBounces) as NonBounces | eval "Pages/Session"=round(Pageviews/Sessions,2) | eval "Avg. Session Duration"=round(Duration/Sessions,2) | eval Bouncerate=round(100*(Bounces/NonBounces),2)."%" ] | fields - Sessions Pageviews Duration Bounces NonBounces

| tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) AS http_session_pageviews,max(Web.http_session_duration) AS http_session_duration,first(Web.http_session_referrer_domain) AS http_session_referrer_domain FROM datamodel=`datamodel` WHERE Web.site="$site$" Web.eventtype=pageview Web.http_session_channel="$channel$" GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats count(eval(http_session_pageviews=1)) AS Bounces, count(eval(http_session_pageviews>1)) AS NonBounces,avg(http_session_pageviews) AS "Pages/Session", avg(http_session_duration) AS "Avg. Session Duration", count AS Sessions, sum(http_session_pageviews) AS Pageviews, sum(http_session_duration) AS Duration by http_session_referrer_domain | eval Bouncerate=round(100*(Bounces/(Bounces+NonBounces)),2) | fields http_session_referrer_domain Sessions Pageviews Bouncerate "Pages/Session" "Avg. Session Duration" Duration Bounces NonBounces | eval Bouncerate=Bouncerate."%" | rename http_session_referrer_domain as "Referer" | eval "Pages/Session"=round('Pages/Session',2) | eval "Avg. Session Duration"=round('Avg. Session Duration',2) | appendpipe [ stats sum(Sessions) AS Sessions, sum(Pageviews) as Pageviews, sum(Duration) as Duration, sum(Bounces) as Bounces, sum(NonBounces) as NonBounces | eval "Pages/Session"=round(Pageviews/Sessions,2) | eval "Avg. Session Duration"=round(Duration/Sessions,2) | eval Bouncerate=round(100*(Bounces/NonBounces),2)."%" | eval Referer="Total for site"] | fields - Duration Bounces NonBounces | sort -Sessions
